nodes.bodyText:
Could you use 0 (never show as action) for new features.

        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        android:defaultValue="1"
          
          
            
                        android:defaultValue="0"

                    ankidroid:showAsAction="ifRoom"/>
          
          
            
                    ankidroid:showAsAction="never"/>
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -56,6 +56,11 @@
         android:title="@string/menu_add_note"
         android:icon="@drawable/ic_add_white_24dp"
         ankidroid:showAsAction="never"/>
+    <item
+        android:id="@+id/action_tag"
+        android:icon="@drawable/ic_tag"
+        android:title="@string/menu_edit_tags"
+        ankidroid:showAsAction="ifRoom"/>

nodes.bodyText:
Add new constants to the end of the enumeration, otherwise this will modify people's preferences.
The order in  gestures_values/gestures_labels controls the order of visible items.
Of course, sorry I should have thought of that.
Yeah I was iffy on it but figured either David would be authoritative or I'd look twice before merge. +1 for authoritative, thanks @david-allison-1
This needs a corresponding entry in gestures_values
